channel.title: Restrict access to file
channel.description:
![image|641x80](upload://k180Kd2twGHSZLeiUfy4rcSv9WE.png)
I want to restrict access to the "WINDOWS_10_PRO_ACTIVATION.bat" unless you open Windows.exe which is my key authorization loader. Is there any way I can possibly do that? I havent found a solution yet.

item.title: Restrict access to file
item.dc:creator: OverDrive
item.description:
You could use the KeyAuthApp.download function to download the file to a pc, and delete it on program completion.

Read full topic
